item.title: The 9th Charnel launches January 30, 2026
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

First-person psychological survival horror game dated.

First-person psychological survival horror game The 9th Charnel will launch for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam on January 30, 2026, publisher SOEDESCO and developer SAIKAT DEB CREATIONS announced.

Here is an overview of the game, via SOEDESCO:

About

The 9th Charnel is a first-person psychological survival horror game set in a world filled with dread and mystery. Blending stealth, combat, and exploration, it builds an atmosphere where every shadow hides a threat and every sound hints at danger waiting to emerge.

The story follows Michael, alongside his colleagues Sara Whitlock and Daniel J. Hart—genetic scientists from the Epsilon Research Institute—who become stranded in a remote valley while conducting field research near a wildlife sanctuary. Cut off from safety and separated from his team, Michael’s search for his friends soon spirals into darkness, where fanatical cults, forgotten rituals, and malignant forces conjure a nightmare with no escape.

As the valley’s secrets unravel, survival grows even more desperate. Uncover the truth and determine the fate of the three scientists by confronting not only monstrous horrors but also the demons within. Scavenge what you need, carefully manage resources, and make choices that test your resolve. Evade enemies through stealth and cunning, or stand your ground when survival demands a fight.

Key Features

  • Explore a world filled with terror and suspense as you uncover an emotionally gripping narrative.
  • Discover hidden clues and uncover forgotten lore, all rendered in cinematically realistic graphics and a hauntingly immersive soundtrack.
  • Unravel the story of several intriguing characters, each driven by their own secrets, fears, and motivations.
  • Survive the horrors by carefully managing resources, scavenging supplies, and making tough choices.
  • Outsmart your enemies using stealth, cunning, and evasion to survive—then, as the tension peaks, gain access to weapons to fight back when all else fails.

Watch a new trailer below.

Release Date Trailer
